inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: MRI of the head revealed an acute 1.7-cm infarct of the right periventricular white matter and posterior right basal ganglia.

inclusion.criterion: Cardiac lab parameters on admission (TnT, CK, CK-MB)
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His vital signs were stable in the primary evaluation. His National Institutes of Health Stroke Scale (NIHSS) score was calculated as 7.
